title: 1. These Regulations are the Avian Influenza (Precautionary Confinement
heading: 1. These Regulations are the Avian Influenza (Precautionary Confinement
text_raw:
1. These Regulations are the Avian Influenza (Precautionary Confinement 
of Birds and Restriction on Assembly of Live Birds) Regulations 2025 
(Revocation) Regulations 2025 and come into operation on 10th May 2025.
text_norm: 1 regulation avian influenza (precautionary confinement bird restriction assembly live birds) regulation 2025 (revocation) regulation 2025 come operation 10th may 2025

title: 1. These Regulations are the Avian Influenza (Precautionary Confinement
heading: 2. The Avian Influenza (Precautionary Confinement of Birds and
text_raw:
2. The Avian Influenza (Precautionary Confinement of Birds and 

Restriction on Assembly of Live Birds) Regulations 2025 are revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

1 May, 2025. 

MARTIN HEYDON, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 6th May, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [156] 3
text_norm: 2 avian influenza (precautionary confinement bird restriction assembly live birds) regulation 2025 revoked given official seal 1 may 2025 martin heydon minister agriculture food marine notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 6th may 2025 156 3

title: 1. These Regulations are the Avian Influenza (Precautionary Confinement
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations revoke the Avian Influenza (Precautionary Confinement of 
Birds and Restriction on Assembly of Live Birds) Regulations 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 4 [156]
